quizQuestions.questionText: Which annotation is used to mark a class as a Room database table?
quizQuestions.explanation: @Entity makes a class an SQLite table in Room.

quizQuestions.questionText: What annotation is used to define database operations?
quizQuestions.explanation: @Dao marks interfaces/abstract classes for Room DAO methods.
